page.title: 04School and the Community
page.content: We believe rural schools have a special place within the communities they serve,and the following will explain how our school fulfils this role.Firstly,we are a meeting place - parents,children and teachers chat together at the beginning and end of the day.Our notice board advertises local events.Every month we hold a school assembly in the village church, attended by local people and parents. Social and fund-raising events are planned with local interests in mind. At major Christian festivals we invite the Senior Citizens to join us and share in refreshments.The monthly Mother and Baby clinic is starting to be held in the school hall,to give mums a chance to get to know each other.This term,we have started a school newspaper which will focus on local events,particularly road closure
